Summary: seen at angle has green blue,red,yellow windows and purple on top and lights seem to glow
divs: Sighting Detailsme my wife and my mother where sitting on the back porch we had just finished and around 8pm i looked up and seen these lights moving back and forth there where two they would chase each other then stop in mid air and sat there for about 2 or 3 minutes then go at it again they did that for about 25 to 35 minutesthen they took off so fast they disappeared in mid air
trends: There have been 32 other sightings in La Porte
